name: Multiverse Rumble 4
description: Multiverse Rumble 4 is a platform fighter which plays quite differently to any ordinary Multiverse Rumble game. The concept of this game is basically the same as Smash Bros. You knock opponents off a ledge, or send them flying. 24 fighters are waiting to rumble, and so are we! So what are you waiting for? Download the game and get ready to rumble!
